101.comments: The SIS will enforce automatically prerequisites for this course.  Students will not be able to register themselves if they do not have the correct prerequisites.  If you need to get your UBC file updated with qualifications such as Transfer Credits, take care of that by sending documentation to admissions.inquiry@ubc.ca.  If this section is blocked; put yourself onto the Wait List WL1.

description: Linear programming problems, dual problems, the simplex algorithm, solution of primal and dual problems, sensitivity analysis. Additional topics chosen from: Karmarkar's algorithm, non-linear programming, game theory, applications.
